0101100101101011 0111001101110110 1 -> sum: 1100110011100010, cout: 0
0011111001111111 1000111010011001 1 -> sum: 1100110100011001, cout: 0
1100100001011010 0100111111110100 1 -> sum: 0001100001001111, cout: 1
0000110011010010 0011010000100011 0 -> sum: 0100000011110101, cout: 0
0110101110000011 0101011110011111 0 -> sum: 1100001100100010, cout: 0
0010100101101011 0110001011011100 1 -> sum: 1000110001001000, cout: 0
